remarks: Commutitivity law for outsideness.  Theorem 6.6 of [Schwabhauser] p. 44. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: outsideofcom $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( P e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( P OutsideOf <. A , B >. <-> P OutsideOf <. B , A >. ) ) $.
